attributes.action: Outsource the British Government via competitive tender.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to the escalating costs of Parliament it would seem prudent to outsource the entire democratic process via competitive tender. The winning bid could come from existing democracy's such as India or successful multi-national's such as Halliburton. In this way British tax payers would continue to enjoy the benefits of the current system but at a fraction of the cost.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
